remarks: Property deduction for an extended metric space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
xmspropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` K ) ) $.
xmspropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
xmspropd.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( dist ` K ) |` ( B X. B ) ) = ( ( dist ` L ) |` ( B X. B ) ) ) $.
xmspropd.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` L ) ) $.
xmspropd $p |- ( ph -> ( K e. *MetSp <-> L e. *MetSp ) ) $.
